title: 21: S5E21 – "Sweet Vengeance" – Scary Stories Told in the Dark
description:
In this episode of Scary Stories Told in the Dark, we bring you four terrifying tales from authors Michael Paige, Ryan Peacock, and Lakk, performed by host and narrator Otis Jiry, about sinful stalkers, vampiric vengeance, and sinister spirits.


Learn more about your ad choices. Visit podcastchoices.com/adchoices
